= Development Guidelines =

This page has details on which guidelines and standards are followed.

<wiki:toc />

----

== !FxCop ==

Stable code must not raise any of !FxCop's warnings, and all should be used. Refer to !FxCop [UsingFxCop usage] and [FxCopExceptions exceptions].

== !StyleCop ==

Stable code must not raise any of !StyleCop's warnings, and all should be used. Refer to !StyleCop [UsingStyleCop usage] and [StyleCopExceptions exceptions].

== Commit Hooks ==

This project's [CommitHooks commit hooks] must be used or simulated by hand.
